doc.field: Print matter: books and other published things: Binder of published articles on fire loss management from "Fire Engineering" magazine. Binder of training bulletin "Management T-1" re teaching OTJ instruction (1961 version) by Delahanty Institute. 2 copies of binder from NYS Academy of Fire Science: "Student Manual: Building Construction for Fire Suppression Forces" (1986). Binder of guidance on "Municipal Fire Administration" (PACT program). Modern Fire Technology, Inc (Fire Tech) training memo series re: management (1979-81). 3 textbooks on firefighting. 5 textbooks on incident management, fire law, sports safety, management/Lombardi Rules. Fireline/wildfire handbook, and other incident management pocket reference books (2004-10).
